Text: Sterling traded at $1.2504, up 0.06% so far on the day, having hit two-month high of $1.2528 as investors reversed their bets against the currency on fear of a no-deal Brexit at the end of next month.
Cause: investors reversed their bets against the currency on fear of a no-deal Brexit at the end of next month.
Effect: Sterling traded at $1.2504, up 0.06% so far on the day, having hit two-month high of $1.2528
